description:
When Kindle was first launched in 2007, it set a fire under the established reading community, which until then had been served, guardedly, by the ‘bricks and mortar’ offline mainstream publishers.

Suddenly the barriers to entry for publishing were torn down, bringing equality and the opportunity for Indie Publishers - private independent publishers like you and me – to publish and compete with the big publishing houses on an equal footing.

The kindle reading device has proved to be incredibly popular, and with the recent launch of the new colour Kindle Fire, children’s eBook sales have also become stratospheric!

 “…The boom in children’s publishing taking place around us. In contrast to an adult market struggling in the face of digital technology and the dominance of cut-price internet retailers, children’s books seemed to be thriving.” The Daily Telegraph 14th Feb. 2013

Now YOU have the opportunity to create and publish your very own children’s book.  Put aside any doubts which you may have.  You do not need to be an established author, nor an illustrator.

My course will lead you through the whole process, with over 6.5 hours of simple ‘over my shoulder’ step-by-step video tuition.

Course Summary
  • Course Introduction
  • Why ‘now’ is the perfect time to publish children’s books
  • What Makes a Successful Book? Storyline & Illustrations in Detail
    • Great Plot / Story line
      • Write your own storyline – not as hard as you think.  Elements to Keep In Mind
      •  Definition: What Makes a Great Children’s Book?
      • Age
      • Theme / Plot
      • Humour
      • Pictures & Illustrations
      • Character Development
      • Structure
      • Writing Essentials
      • Outsource your writing – family & friends, writers group, 3rd party writers:
        • Cover & Illustrations
          • Create your Own
            • Where to buy your own images
            • How to create your own images – Free
            • How to create your own images – Paid
        • Outsource image & cover creation:
    • Learn Six ‘Cutting Edge’ Techniques to Create Children’s Books
      • A Simple Text & Image Book
      • A ‘Spot the Difference’ Book 
      • An Alternative Outcome Book 
      • A ‘Where’s Wally Type Book
      • A Photograph Book
      • A Cartoon Book
        • Introducing Kindle Comic Software
    • How to Format Your Book for Kindle
      • Manually
      • Using software
    • How To Upload To Kindle & Publish
      • Manually
      • Using software
    • Essential Sales Page Marketing Components: 
    • Course Summary; Inc.
      • KDP Marketing Promotion
      • Amazon’s Kindle Changing Market share.
      • Publish on Other Publishing Platforms?
      • Amazon’s Benefits
      • KDP Select & Benefits
      • The Pros & Cons of KDP’s Exclusivity Mode
    • Resources Guide - PDF
title: How to Self-Publish Children's Books on Kindle
